==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=麦}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – a wheat plant.  Originally {{m|zh|來}} was a pictogram for "wheat" and 麥, adding a foot beneath, was invented for the nearly homophonous word "come".  With time, the simpler character became fixed as the writing of the more common word "come", leaving 麥 for "wheat".
